[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/cursor](./cursor.md) &gt; [CursorModel](./cursor.cursormodel.md)

## CursorModel class

Cursor component model.

Use `tickBlink()` to start blinking, or handle `InitialBlinkMsg` from `initBlink()`<!-- -->. Handle `BlinkMsg`<!-- -->, `FocusMsg`<!-- -->, and `BlurMsg` in your update loop.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CursorModel 
```
